00042 QString CToolClass::locatehtml(const QString &filename) {
00043   QString path = locate("html", KGlobal::locale()->language() + '/' + filename);
00044   if (path.isNull())
00045         path = locate("html", "default/" + filename);
00046   if (path.isNull())
00047         path = locate("html", "en/" + filename);
00048   return path;
00049 }
00050 
00052 QString CToolClass::htmlToText(const QString& html) {
00053   QString newText = html;
00054   // convert some tags we need in code
00055     newText.replace( QRegExp(" "),"#SPACE#" );
00056     newText.replace( QRegExp("<BR>\\s*"), "<BR>\n" );
00057     newText.replace( QRegExp("#SPACE#")," " );
00058 
00059   QRegExp re("<.+>");
00060   re.setMinimal(true);
00061   newText.replace( re,"" );
00062     return newText; 
00063 }
00064 
00066 QString CToolClass::textToHTML(const QString& text){
00067     QString newText = text;
00068     newText.replace( QRegExp("<BR>\n"),"#NEWLINE#" );
00069     newText.replace( QRegExp("\n"),"<BR>\n" );
00070     newText.replace( QRegExp("#NEWLINE#"),"<BR>\n");    
00071     return newText;
00072 }
00073 
00076 bool CToolClass::savePlainFile( const QString& filename, const QString& text){
00077     QFile saveFile(filename);
00078     bool ret;
00079         
00080     if (saveFile.exists()) {
00081         if (KMessageBox::warningYesNo(0,
00082                 QString::fromLatin1("<qt><B>%1</B><BR>%2</qt>")
00083                     .arg( i18n("The file does already exist!") )
00084                     .arg( i18n("Do you want to overwrite it?")))
00085                 == KMessageBox::No
00086             )
00087             return false;
00088         else
00089             saveFile.remove();
00090     }
00091     
00092     if ( saveFile.open(IO_ReadWrite) ) {
00093         QTextStream textstream( &saveFile );
00094         textstream << text;
00095         saveFile.close();
00096         ret = true;
00097     }
00098     else {
00099         KMessageBox::error(0, QString::fromLatin1("<qt>%1<BR><B>%2</B></qt>")
00100             .arg( i18n("Sorry! But the file couldn't be saved!") )
00101             .arg( i18n("Please check permissions etc. !")));
00102         saveFile.close();
00103         ret = false;        
00104     }   
00105     return ret;
00106 }

00110 QPixmap CToolClass::getIconForModule( CSwordModuleInfo* module_info ){
00111   if (!module_info)
00112     return QPixmap(BIBLE_ICON_SMALL);
00113     
00114     switch (module_info->type()){
00115       case CSwordModuleInfo::Bible:
00116         if (module_info->isLocked())
00117           return QPixmap(BIBLE_LOCKED_ICON_SMALL);
00118         else
00119           return QPixmap(BIBLE_ICON_SMALL);
00120     
00121       case CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon:
00122         if (module_info->isLocked())
00123           return QPixmap(LEXICON_LOCKED_ICON_SMALL);
00124         else
00125           return QPixmap(LEXICON_ICON_SMALL);
00126     
00127       case CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary:
00128         if (module_info->isLocked())
00129           return QPixmap(COMMENTARY_LOCKED_ICON_SMALL);
00130         else
00131           return QPixmap(COMMENTARY_ICON_SMALL);
00132     
00133       case CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook:
00134         if (module_info->isLocked())
00135           return QPixmap(BOOK_LOCKED_ICON_SMALL);
00136         else
00137           return QPixmap(BOOK_ICON_SMALL);  
00138     
00139       case CSwordModuleInfo::Unknown:
00140       default:
00141         return QPixmap(BIBLE_ICON_SMALL);
00142     }
00143 }
00144 
00145 int CToolClass::makeLogicFontSize( const int s ) {
00146     const int defSize = QApplication::font().pointSize();
00147   if ( s < defSize - 4 )
00148         return 1;
00149     if ( s < defSize )
00150         return 2;
00151     if ( s < defSize + 4 )
00152         return 3;
00153     if ( s < defSize + 8 )
00154         return 4;
00155     if ( s < defSize + 12 )
00156         return 5;
00157     if (s < defSize + 16 )
00158         return 6;
00159     return 7;
00160 }

00162 QLabel* CToolClass::explanationLabel(QWidget* parent, const QString& heading, const QString& text ){
00163   QLabel* label = new QLabel( QString::fromLatin1("<B>%1</B><BR>%2").arg(heading).arg(text),parent );
00164   label->setAutoResize(true);
00165   label->setMargin(1);
00166   label->setFrameStyle(QFrame::Box | QFrame::Plain);
00167   return label;
00168 }
00170 bool CToolClass::inHTMLTag(int pos, QString & text){
00171  int i1=text.findRev("<",pos);
00172  int i2=text.findRev(">",pos);
00173  int i3=text.find(">",pos);
00174  int i4=text.find("<",pos);
00175 
00176 
00177 //  if ((i1>0) && (i2==-1))  //we're in th first html tag
00178 //      i2=i1; // not ncessary, just for explanation
00179 
00180     if ((i3>0) && (i4==-1))  //we're in the last html tag
00181       i4=i3+1;
00182 
00183 //  qWarning("%d > %d && %d < %d",i1,i2,i3,i4);
00184 
00185  if ( (i1>i2) && (i3<i4) )
00186     return true; //yes, we're in a tag
00187 
00188   return false;
00189 }
